Nightlight::

"Do you really like that I be your girlfriend?" said Nightlight while 
she leant fowards Rodimus.


--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> : : Rodimus Prime : :
> 
> He brings his glass up and takes a sip of the gin. 
> 
> Rodimus Prime: Thank you. Now that we seem to know each other 
pretty well, I was wondering if you would like to be the Commander's 
girlfriend?
